item.description:
Plymouth Plantation brings history to life!
This historical experience will take us through the journey of the Wampanoag Homesite and we'll experience how an indigenous family lived in 1627. Then we'll visit an English Village where customed role players portray actual residents who lived in thatched houses. Skilled artisans will demonstrate 17th century furniture, basket making, potter, and beadwork amongst other skills. See the farming community at Nye Barn with cows, sheep, goats pigs and poultry.

Then we'll climb aboard the Mayflower II where the crew will tell us about the historic 1957 transatlantic crossing.

Carpooling highly recommended. Updated agenda will be provided as the date gets closer.

Rain date November 28th. Joint Meetup with Girl Fun.
item.name: Plymouth Plantation
